title: Android 10 Pixel 3a - Desktop Mode
content:
Hi.
I have upgraded my pixel 3a to Android 10 recently.
I have heard the new os has "desktop mode".
So I turned on the developer mode and some options.

What cable do I need?

I tried usb c to hdmi & usb c to dvi, but nothing worked.

Does pixel 3a support desktop mode?
